English
Dong-chul (Gong Yoo) is the best field agent in North Korea - until he is
abandoned during a mission, his wife and daughter murdered. Hunted and on the
run, torn between grief and vengeance, he takes a job as a night driver for the
CEO of a powerful corporation. The chairman is brutally assassinated - but gives
Dong-chul a pair of glasses before he dies. Now, he's on the run again. Accused
of murder, wanted for treason, and desperate to uncover the volatile national
secrets hidden inside the glasses. Dong-Chul wants the truth. And he'll start a
war to get it.
